quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the ability to act in spite of it.
author: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj

quote: A disciplined mind leads to happiness, and an undisciplined mind leads to suffering.
author: Sant Dnyaneshwar

quote: True knowledge leads to humility, and through humility, one attains greatness.
author: Sant Tukaram

quote: One who conquers his own mind, conquers the world.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Work is worship; keep moving, and the world will follow you.
author: Lokmanya Tilak
